statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-15) and (11,2).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{{2}-{\left(-{15}\right)}}}{{{11}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{17}}{{9}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{17}}{{9}} (if it's not already reduced)
